newsitem.title: USA: PRESS DIGEST - Washington Post business - Sept 4.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Washington Post business - Sept 4.

text.p: The Washington Post carried the following major business stories on Wednesday:
WASHINGTON - U.S. missile attacks on Iraqi military targets send oil prices higher as traders react to suspension of U.N. oil-for-food plan.
WASHINGTON - Best Products Inc receives a $64 million buyout offer from the Miami investment firm Ocean Reef Management Inc.
WASHINGTON - Cordant Inc announces a deal to be acquired by defence contractor Tracor Inc for as much as $80 million.
WASHINGTON - Statistics showing a decreasing number of hours worked each week by the average person have fuelled the debate over whether Americans are overworked.
